Description:
Detects the execution of "wmic" with the "process" flag, which adversary might use to list processes running on the compromised host or list installed software hotfixes and patches.

Author: frack113
Sigma Repository: [GitHub](https://github.com/SigmaHQ/sigma)
Name: Process Reconnaissance Via Wmic.EXE
Query: sourcetype='windows-sysmon' eql select * from _source_ where (((process_path like '%\wmic.exe' and original_file_name = 'wmic.exe') and command like '%process%') and  not (command like '%call%' and command like '%create%'))
